```{r}
#| label: tbl-sdid1-results
#| tbl-cap: "SDID Model Results"
#| tbl-cap-location: top

combined_att_data <- tibble(
  Model = c("Main (2022-2024)", "PIT (2019-2021)"),
  Estimate = c(att, placebo_att),
  Std.Error = c(se, placebo_se),
  ci.lower = c(ci_lower, placebo_ci_lower),
  ci.upper = c(ci_upper, placebo_ci_upper),
  p.value = c(p_value, placebo_p_value),
  RMSE = c(rmse, rmse_placebo)
)

sdid1_results <- combined_att_data %>%
  gt() %>%
  cols_label(
    Model = "Model",
    Estimate = "ATT",
    Std.Error = "Std. Error",
    ci.lower = "95% CI",
    p.value = "P-Value",
    RMSE = "RMSE"
  ) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = c(Estimate, Std.Error, ci.lower, ci.upper, RMSE), decimals = 3) %>%
  cols_merge(columns = c(ci.lower, ci.upper), pattern = "[{1}â€“{2}]") %>%
  fmt(
    columns = p.value,
    fns = function(x) gtsummary::style_pvalue(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  tab_source_note("Note: Standard errors and p-values computed via robust bootstrap method.") %>%
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "Placebo In-Time Model.",
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = Model,
      rows = Model == "PIT (2019-2021)"
    )
  ) %>%
  theme_gt_bachelor_project() # Your theme function (without tab_options)

sdid1_results
```
